title: Remembering Stan Lee, Plus Homecoming's Micah Bloomberg and Eli Horowitz | The Watch (Ep. 306)
description:
Marvel creator Stan Lee died this week at the age of 95 (2:26), and his legacy will live on through the universe he created (11:16). Plus: 'Homecoming' creators Micah Bloomberg and Eli Horowitz talk about turning their podcast into prestige television (25:53).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guests: Micah Bloomberg and Eli Horowitz

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
